alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 9:50PM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches near the crest and 4 to 8 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. This could impact travel on I-90.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
